      • addErrorPanel

        public abstract CaptionComponent addErrorPanel(CaptionComponent captionComponent,
                                               DomElement... elements)
        Adds an error-checking square that is usually found in the top-right ange of a text editor to the specified CaptionComponent.
        Parameters:
        captionComponent - The component to add error panel to
        elements - DOM elements that will be error-checked
        Returns:
        captionComponent
